detector-recipe
***************


Description
===========

A detector recipe is a collection of rules that can be configured to
trigger problems that appear on the Cloud Guard Problems page. A
DetectorRecipe object contains settings for a specific detector
recipe, plus a list of the detector rules (DetectorRecipeDetectorRule
objects) belonging to the DetectorRecipe object.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
